page.title: 12HEALTH.
page.content: The Health and welfare of the Community of this area is covered by { {A Medical Group Practice }of five Doctors at Tenbury Wells Surgery. Working in conjunction with them are District Nursing Sisters/Midwives, Health Visitors, Ambulance and Car Transport. {Hospitals.}Tenbury and District Hospital deals with IN and OUT Patient Facilities, Accident, Xrays and Minor operations under Kidderminster Health Authority,using also Hereford. Shrewsbury and Worcester Hospitals for major cases and Maternity Care.{ {Chemist,Chiropodist,Dentist and {Optician }all available at Tenbury Wells and Leominster. {Elderly. }There are three Rest Homes for the Elderly in the Tenbury area. The W.R.V.S. Provides Meals on Wheels
